GSD.description:
drm: Use size_t type for len variable in drm_copy_field()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.75 by commit df5ac9392648394db23a98442d58f283b5479329. For more details please see the references link.
